title: Common
description: A collection of commonly used types. Should maybe come from somehwere else, one day.

doiOrWebAddress.title: doiOrWebAddress
doiOrWebAddress.description: Either a formal Digital Object Identifier, or a link to any other web resource, describing the protocol

citation.title: citation
citation.description: A plain text representation of the recommended citation text to be used in referencing the protocol description

informalReference.title: informalReference
informalReference.description: For use only if a non-citable and non-machine referenceable document exists, a written description may be provided
